name: Crumbling Economy
description:
Meet Gallie and Bob, Gallie is the cute little secretary and Bob is the treaurer. How long do you think they'll survive when items start falling from the sky? Catch all the items before they destroy all the ground!


Lore:
You're the newly hired treasurer and secretary of Crumble Inc. and it's your job to collect and contain the company's profits. As Gallie, you are very fast but can't jump that high; and as Bob, you are really slow but can jump really high.
